verses.verse: ( God’s Righteous Judgment) ( 520 2:1-16 ) לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster: אַל־ <WH516> ’al- vvv תַּשְׁחֵ֑ת <WH516> taš·ḥêṯ [To the tune of] “Do Not Destroy. ” מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> lə·’ā·sāp̄ of Asaph. שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> šîr A song. ה֘וֹדִ֤ינוּ <WH3034> hō·w·ḏî·nū We give thanks לְּךָ֨׀ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to You, אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים 430 N-mp ( ’ĕlō·hîm) O God; ה֭וֹדִינוּ 3034 V-Hifil-Perf-1cp ( hō·w·ḏî·nū) we give thanks, וְקָר֣וֹב 7138 Conj-w│Adj-ms ( wə·qā·rō·wḇ) is near. שְׁמֶ֑ךָ 8034 N-msc│2ms ( šə·me·ḵā) for Your Name סִ֝פְּר֗וּ 5608 V-Piel-Perf-3cp ( sip·pə·rū) The people declare נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ 6381 V-Nifal-Prtcpl-fpc│2ms ( nip̄·lə·’ō·w·ṯe·ḵā) Your wondrous works.
כִּ֭י <WH3588> kî “ When אֶקַּ֣ח <WH3947> ’eq·qaḥ I choose מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mō·w·‘êḏ a time, אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> ’ă·nî I מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <WH4339> mê·šā·rîm fairly. אֶשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <WH8199> ’eš·pōṭ will judge

נְֽמֹגִ֗ים <WH4127> nə·mō·ḡîm quake, אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ When the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> yō·šə·ḇe·hā its dwellers אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî it is I תִכַּ֖נְתִּי <WH8505> ṯik·kan·tî who bear up עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <WH5982> ‘am·mū·ḏe·hā its pillars. סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> ’ā·mar·tî I say לַֽ֭הוֹלְלִים <WH1984> la·hō·wl·lîm to the proud, אַל־ <WH408> ’al- ‘ Do not תָּהֹ֑לּוּ <WH1984> tā·hōl·lū boast, ’ וְ֝לָרְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> wə·lā·rə·šā·‘îm and to the wicked, אַל־ <WH408> ’al- ‘ Do not תָּרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> tā·rî·mū lift up קָֽרֶן׃ <WH7161> qā·ren your horn.

אַל־ <WH408> ’al- Do not תָּרִ֣ימוּ <WH7311> tā·rî·mū lift up לַמָּר֣וֹם <WH4791> lam·mā·rō·wm against heaven קַרְנְכֶ֑ם <WH7161> qar·nə·ḵem your horn תְּדַבְּר֖וּ <WH1696> tə·ḏab·bə·rū or speak בְצַוָּ֣אר <WH6677> ḇə·ṣaw·wār neck. ’” עָתָֽק׃ <WH6277> ‘ā·ṯāq with an outstretched

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî For לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō comes neither מִ֭מּוֹצָא <WH4161> mim·mō·w·ṣā from east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> ū·mim·ma·‘ă·rāḇ nor west, וְ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> wə·lō nor מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mim·miḏ·bar out of the desert, הָרִֽים׃ <WH7311> hā·rîm exaltation

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- but אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm it is God שֹׁפֵ֑ט <WH8199> šō·p̄êṭ who judges; זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh one יַ֝שְׁפִּ֗יל <WH8213> yaš·pîl He brings down וְזֶ֣ה <WH2088> wə·zeh another. יָרִֽים׃ <WH7311> yā·rîm and exalts

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî For כ֪וֹס <WH3563> ḵō·ws a cup בְּֽיַד־ <WH3027> bə·yaḏ- is in the hand יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> wə·ya·yin wine חָמַ֨ר׀ <WH2560> ḥā·mar foaming מָ֥לֵא <WH4392> mā·lê full of מֶסֶךְ֮ <WH4538> me·seḵ mixed with spices. וַיַּגֵּ֪ר <WH5064> way·yag·gêr He pours מִ֫זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> miz·zeh from [His cup], אַךְ־ <WH389> ’a·ḵōš- and שְׁ֭מָרֶיהָ <WH8105> mā·re·hā to the dregs. יִמְצ֣וּ <WH4680> yim·ṣū ... יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> yiš·tū drink it down כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> kōl all רִשְׁעֵי־ <WH7563> riš·‘ê- the wicked אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ of the earth

וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> wa·’ă·nî But I אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> ’ag·gîḏ will proclaim Him ( Or proclaim it) לְעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·lām forever; אֲ֝זַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> ’ă·zam·mə·rāh I will sing praise לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> lê·lō·hê to the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ of Jacob.

וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl “ All קַרְנֵ֣י <WH7161> qar·nê the horns רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> rə·šā·‘îm of the wicked אֲגַדֵּ֑עַ <WH1438> ’ă·ḡad·dê·a‘ I will cut off, תְּ֝רוֹמַ֗מְנָה <WH7311> tə·rō·w·mam·nāh will be exalted. ” קַֽרְנ֥וֹת <WH7161> qar·nō·wṯ but the horns צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> ṣad·dîq of the righteous
